pkgmetadata.longdescription: Import, Recompute and Analyze Data from Portable Gas Analyzers // The gasanalyzer R package offers methods for importing, preprocessing, and analyzing data related to photosynthetic characteristics (gas exchange, chlorophyll fluorescence and isotope ratios). It translates variable names into a standard format, and can recalculate derived, physiological quantities using imported or predefined equations. The package also allows users to assess the sensitivity of their results to different assumptions used in the calculations. See also Tholen (2024) doi:10.1093/aobpla/plae035.
